description: ff. 177. 200 x 141; 144 x 76 mm. 23 lin. 1037 H. Baghdādī, Hadīyat al-ʻārifīn (1951-55), I, 580 mentions ʻAzīz al-Dīn ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn Muḥammad al-Nasafī, d. 686 H. - possibly the same author? Commentary on al-Arbaʻūn al-Wadʻānīyah: ḥājjī Khalīfah, Kashf al-ẓunūn, III, 512 (no. 6690). Incip.: ... الحمد لله الذى دلت لعزته الصفات
author: Samarqandī, ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn Muḥammad
creator: Samarqandī, ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn Muḥammad
subject: Ibn Wadʻān, Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī, d. 1101—Arbaʻīn al-Wadʻānīyah
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
